post.description: Lists the predefined brand groups for which reports may be requested.

brandGroupIdFilter.description: Only list brand groups with one of these ID values.

countryCodeFilter.description: Only list brand groups with one of these ISO 3166 country codes.

maxResults.description: Number of records to include in the paginated response. Defaults to max page size.

nextToken.description: Token value allowing navigation to the next response page.
Token value allowing navigation to the next response page.

dueDate.description: The due date of the report. Used for prioritization.

endDate.description: Inclusive end of the reporting period. Must be a Saturday or Sunday when `timeUnit` is `WEEKLY`.

reportName.description: The display name of the report.

startDate.description: Inclusive start of the reporting period. Must be a Sunday or Monday when `timeUnit` is `WEEKLY`.

get.description: Gets the generation status of a report by ID.

429.description: Too many requests. Request was rate-limited. Re...

MmmBrandGroup.description: The predefined brand or group of products being reported on.

advertiserName.description: Name of the advertiser associated with the brand group.

brandGroupId.description: The unique identifier of the brand group.

brandGroupName.description: The display name of the brand group.

countryCode.description: The ISO 3166 country code of the marketplace associated with the brand group.

brandGroupId.description: Identifies the brand group being reported on.

geoDimension.description:
Geographic granularity of the report.
|Value|Description|
|---|---|
|COUNTRY|Aggregate metrics by country.|
|POSTAL_CODE|Aggregate metrics by postal code, e.g. ZIP Code. Valid only in select countries.|
|DMA|Aggregate metrics by DMAÂ® (Designated Market Area) region. Valid only in the US.|

metricsType.description:
The type of metrics to include in the report.
|Value|Description|
|---|---|
|MEDIA_ONLY|Core advertising metrics only.|
|MEDIA_AND_SALES|Advertising and retail metrics.|

timeUnit.description:
Time granularity of the report.
|Value|Description|
|---|---|
|DAILY|Aggregate metrics with daily granularity.|
|WEEKLY|Aggregate metrics with weekly granularity.|

createdAt.description: The date and time when the report was created.

dueDate.description: The due date of the report.

endDate.description: Inclusive end of the reporting period.

failureCode.description: An error code indicating why the report failed. Present when the status is `FAILED`.

failureMessage.description: A human-readable message providing more information about the failure. Present when the status is `FAILED`.

reportId.description: The unique identifier of the report.

reportName.description: The display name of the report.

startDate.description: Inclusive start of the reporting period.

status.description:
The report generation status.
|Value|Description|
|---|---|
|PENDING|Report is created and awaiting processing.|
|PROCESSING|Report is processing.|
|SUCCEEDED|Report is completed. Check `urls` for the output files.|
|FAILED|Report processing failed. Check the `failureCode` and `failureMessage` for details.|
|CANCELED|Report is canceled. Contact <mmm-support@amazon.com> if this is unexpected.|

urls.description: The URLs for downloading output files. Present when the status is `SUCCEEDED`.

urlsExpireAt.description: The expiration date of the download URLs. Present when the status is `SUCCEEDED`.
